name: raycast-airtable-extension
title: Airtable
description: List your Airtable bases and follow deep links to specific tables, views, or your base's API docs.
author: marks

preferences.name: airtableUiBaseUrl
preferences.title: Airtable UI Base URL
preferences.label: Airtable UI Base URL
preferences.description: The base URL for the Airtable UI (you probably don't need to change this)

preferences.name: airtableApiBaseUrl
preferences.title: Airtable API Base URL
preferences.label: Airtable API Base URL
preferences.description: The base URL for the Airtable API (you probably don't need to change this)

preferences.name: airtableOAuthClientId
preferences.title: Airtable OAuth Client ID
preferences.label: Airtable OAuth Integration Client ID
preferences.description: The OAuth client ID for the Airtable integration

preferences.name: airtablePersonalAccessToken
preferences.title: Airtable Personal Access Token
preferences.description: Optional Personal Access Token for the Airtable integration

commands.name: command-list-bases
commands.title: List Bases
commands.subtitle: Airtable
commands.description: See and search through a list of your Airtable bases and their tables/fields/views

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
